612790.name: INFINITI VR
612790.description:
INFINITI IQ is a branded VR experience created by The Pulse. Yes, it’s a car ad, but unlike any car ad you’ve seen before.

We believe that it’s worth experiencing purely for the photo-real environments created using photogrammetry and for the gaze activated and triggered interactions (Skimming stones, animal and car interactions) along the way.
612790.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 德语
